sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_83c9ec1bdb7e4010b0595ff25e9619c1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_build_test_result</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Build Test Results in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundTestRuns = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
                
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }

        if (se.pipeline_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var pe = se.pipeline_execution.getRefRecord();

        var pse = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        pse.query('pipeline_execution', pe.getUniqueValue());

        while (pse.next()) {
            if (pse.task_execution.nil()) { continue; }
            var te = pse.task_execution.getRefRecord();
            
            var btr = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_build_test_result');
            btr.addEncodedQuery('build_test_summary.task_execution=' + te.getUniqueValue());
            btr.query();

            while (btr.next()) {
                foundTestRuns[btr.getUniqueValue()] = true;
            }
        }

        var trid = Object.keys(foundTestRuns).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', trid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>build_test_summary</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-11 09:15:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>83c9ec1bdb7e4010b0595ff25e9619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Build Test Results in Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps Change Flow" source="x_snc_sndo_chg_flw">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Change Flow">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_83c9ec1bdb7e4010b0595ff25e9619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 09:15:29</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=83c9ec1bdb7e4010b0595ff25e9619c1"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_e11ba09bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96196e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_work_item</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Work Items in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundStories = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        
        if (se.task_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var te = se.task_execution.getRefRecord();
        
        var ce = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_m2m_commit_execution');
        ce.query('task_execution', te.getUniqueValue());
        
        while (ce.next()) {
            if (ce.commit.nil()) { continue; }
            var c = ce.commit.getRefRecord();

            if (c.work_item.nil()) { continue; }
            var wi = c.work_item.getRefRecord();

            foundStories[wi.getUniqueValue()] = true;
        }

        var wiid = Object.keys(foundStories).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', wiid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>assignee</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-11 09:21:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>e11ba09bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96196e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Work Items in Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps Change Flow" source="x_snc_sndo_chg_flw">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Change Flow">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_e11ba09bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96196e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 09:21:34</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e11ba09bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96196e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_ccfa209bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961933
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_commit</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Commits in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundCommits = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        
        var pe = se.pipeline_execution.getRefRecord();

		se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        se.addQuery('pipeline_execution', pe.getUniqueValue());
        se.addNotNullQuery('task_execution');
        se.query();
        se.next();

        if (se.task_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var te = se.task_execution.getRefRecord();
        
        var ce = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_m2m_commit_execution');
        ce.query('task_execution', te.getUniqueValue());
        
        while (ce.next()) {
            if (ce.commit.nil()) { continue; }
            var c = ce.commit.getRefRecord();
        
            foundCommits[c.getUniqueValue()] = true;
        }

        var cid = Object.keys(foundCommits).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', cid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>commit_reverted</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-11 09:19:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>ccfa209bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961933</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Commits in Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps Change Flow" source="x_snc_sndo_chg_flw">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Change Flow">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_ccfa209bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961933</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 09:19:31</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ccfa209bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961933"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_6eaa2c5bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96191f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_work_item</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Defects in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundStories = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        
        var pe = se.pipeline_execution.getRefRecord();

        se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        se.addQuery('pipeline_execution', pe.getUniqueValue());
        se.addNotNullQuery('task_execution');
        se.query();
        se.next();

		if (se.task_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var te = se.task_execution.getRefRecord();
        
        var ce = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_m2m_commit_execution');
        ce.query('task_execution', te.getUniqueValue());
        
        while (ce.next()) {
            if (ce.commit.nil()) { continue; }
            var c = ce.commit.getRefRecord();

            if (c.work_item.nil()) { continue; }
            var wi = c.work_item.getRefRecord();

            if ((wi.getValue('type') || '').toLowerCase() !== 'bug') { continue; }

            foundStories[wi.getUniqueValue()] = true;
        }

        var wiid = Object.keys(foundStories).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', wiid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>assignee</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-11 09:18:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>6eaa2c5bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96191f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Defects in Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps Change Flow" source="x_snc_sndo_chg_flw">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Change Flow">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_6eaa2c5bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96191f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 09:18:22</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6eaa2c5bdb7e4010b0595ff25e96191f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_a74ae45bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961924
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_work_item</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Stories in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundStories = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        
        var pe = se.pipeline_execution.getRefRecord();

        se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        se.addQuery('pipeline_execution', pe.getUniqueValue());
        se.addNotNullQuery('task_execution');
        se.query();
        se.next();

		if (se.task_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var te = se.task_execution.getRefRecord();
        
        var ce = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_m2m_commit_execution');
        ce.query('task_execution', te.getUniqueValue());
        
        while (ce.next()) {
            if (ce.commit.nil()) { continue; }
            var c = ce.commit.getRefRecord();

            if (c.work_item.nil()) { continue; }
            var wi = c.work_item.getRefRecord();

            if ((wi.getValue('type') || '').toLowerCase() !== 'story') { continue; }

            foundStories[wi.getUniqueValue()] = true;
        }

        var wiid = Object.keys(foundStories).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', wiid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>assignee</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-11 09:16:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>a74ae45bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961924</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Stories in Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps Change Flow" source="x_snc_sndo_chg_flw">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Change Flow">afe1b84fdb33f300595ed49fdf96199a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_a74ae45bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961924</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 09:16:54</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a74ae45bdb7e4010b0595ff25e961924"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_95c2e853db7e4010b0595ff25e961972
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="DELETE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sn_devops_build_test_result</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Build Test Results in Change</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {
    try {
        var foundTestRuns = {};

        var se = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
                
        se.query('change_request', parent.getUniqueValue());
        if (!se.next()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }

        if (se.pipeline_execution.nil()) { current.addQuery('sys_id', 0); return; }
        var pe = se.pipeline_execution.getRefRecord();

        var pse = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_step_execution');
        pse.query('pipeline_execution', pe.getUniqueValue());

        while (pse.next()) {
            if (pse.task_execution.nil()) { continue; }
            var te = pse.task_execution.getRefRecord();
            
            var btr = new GlideRecord('sn_devops_build_test_result');
            btr.addEncodedQuery('build_test_summary.task_execution=' + te.getUniqueValue());
            btr.query();

            while (btr.next()) {
                foundTestRuns[btr.getUniqueValue()] = true;
            }
        }

        var trid = Object.keys(foundTestRuns).join(',');

        current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', trid);
    } catch (e) {
        current.addQuery('sys_id', 0);
    }
